string.text: Old times: speak to Raven
Jackal has declared me the head of the detachment and instructed me to keep an eye on our business in the Cordon. Raven probably wants to talk to me about my promotion.
Old times: speak to Courier
Some unexpected guests have shown up at our doorstep. I need to find out what they want.
Old times: neutralize the stalkers
Our visitors need to be taken care of. They’ve plotted something, and a discussion with them isn’t leading anywhere good.
Old times: discuss recent events with Raven
The unknown stalkers are dead, but we didn’t manage to find out anything about their plans. I get the feeling they came here just to fight. I should talk to Raven about this.
First steps: follow Raven
It seems the unknown stalkers had nothing to do with Wolf in the rookie village, but I should take it up with him personally and see Sidorovich while I’m at it.
First steps: speak to Wolf
Wolf has sent a message and says that Sidorovich isn’t available right now and that it’d be better if I speak to Wolf personally.
Missing squad: find Wolf’s group
Wolf hasn’t heard from his group for a while and has requested me to find them. The group was located in bandit territory and has likely come under attack.
Missing squad: help the stalker
Only one stalker is alive at the site, and he’s wounded. He needs help.
Missing squad: discuss the details of the assault
We need to come up with a plan for the assault.
Missing squad: eliminate the bandits
The bandits need to be eliminated in order to save the captive stalkers.
Missing squad: free the captives
The bandits are all down. Now the stalkers have to be freed, after which we can return back to the rookie village.
Missing squad: speak to Raven
Before we leave, I need to discuss a little something with Raven.
Missing squad: speak to Wolf
I’ve completed the task. I should have a few words with Wolf.
Waiting customer: speak to Sidorovich
Wolf has messaged me that Sidorovich is free and ready to speak with me. Time to head over there and have a chat.
Special contract: plant the beacon on the bridge

Sidorovich has tasked me with finding a stalker by the name of Klim and retrieving a flash drive from him. Klim is also to be killed. In order to locate him, I need to plant a beacon on the destroyed bridge.
Special contract: wait for signs
The beacon has been placed. Time to wait for further orders from Sidorovich.
Special contract: find Klim
Sidorovich has provided me with Klim’s PDA coordinates. Time to track him down.
Special contract: speak to the hunter
Klim’s already dead, and by his corpse is another stalker. I need to find out how he’s connected to Klim’s death.
Special contract: follow the hunter
It’s likely that a pseudodog has swallowed the flash drive. I need to help the hunter find it and kill it.
Special contract: kill the pseudodog
We’ve found the pseudodog. Time to kill it.
Special contract: extract the flash drive from the pseudodog body
The pseudodog is dead. I can now open up its belly and see if the flash drive is there or not.
Special contract: speak to the hunter
I’ve found the flash drive. Before I head back to the village, I should speak to the hunter.
Special contract: return to Sidorovich
Time to return to Sidorovich and complete the contract.
Special contract: give the flash drive to Sidorovich
I’ve completed the assignment. I should give the flash drive to Sidorovich.
Special contract: take the beacon in the storeroom
Sidorovich says that a beacon can help with finding Klim. I should take it from the storeroom and place it on the Cordon bridge.
Right to choose: speak to Zokhan
Zokhan has messaged me and says that he needs to talk to me.
Demanding customer: speak to Sidorovich
Sidorovich wants to talk to me about something; likely his next contract.
Mercenary work: speak to Vulture about hiring guards for the bunker
The trader has asked me to provide him with two able men to protect the bunker. I should go to the vehicle station and ask Vulture to contact Jackal to spare some extra manpower.
Mercenary work: receive the contract from Coordinator
Vulture has informed me about Coordinator’s arrival in the Cordon. I should meet up with him and receive my next contract.
Mercenary work: meet the client
Coordinator has given me the contract. Time to meet up with the customer and find out about its details.
Syndicate contract: speak to Raven
Coordinator has given us an contract from Jackal. I need to discuss it with Raven.
Syndicate contract: deal with Van
I need to find a non-lethal way to deal with Van in the rookie village. While I’m at it, I need to be quiet about breaking into the storeroom.
Syndicate contract: speak to Raccoon
Perhaps Raccoon, a local stalker, can help me with fulfilling the contract. I should see him.
Syndicate contract: retreive the black box from the storeroom
Van’s likely to be sleeping from the booze Raccoon gave him. Perfect time to grab the black box.
Syndicate contract: hand the black box to Coordinator
I’ve got the black box. I should give it to Coordinator.
No morals: plan the assassination of Father Valerian
My next contract involves assassinating the leader of the loners: Father Valerian. I’ll need to plan it carefully before making any move.
No morals: speak to Raccoon
I’ve got an interesting idea. I should speak about it to Raccoon in the rookie village, who I saved not long ago from the bandits.
No morals: tell Raven about the plan
I’ve sent Raccoon to the base by the embankment. I can now share my plan with Raven.
No morals: follow Raven
The plan is in effect. Time to return back to base and wait for Raccoon to do his thing.
No morals: wait for Raccoon’s actions
I need to wait for Raccoon to work his magic. Until then, I better not do anything suspicious.
No morals: speak to Raven
Valerian has taken the bait and left the base. It’s time to take over.
No morals: kill Father Valerian and his group
The time has come to eliminate Father Valerian and his group.
No morals: take Father Valerian’s PDA
Valerian is dead. I need to bring his PDA as proof that the contract has been fulfilled.
No morals: wait until morning
Yaroschuk has informed me that he’ll wait for me at the same place in the morning.
No morals: complete the contract
Yaroschuk should be at the location as before. I can now complete the contract and receive the reward.
Hot trader: speak to Sidorovich
Sidorovich has sent me a message to come and see him.
Vital package: give the package to Orest
Sidorovich has handed me a package that needs to go to Orest, the new head of the loner base.
Easy prey: speak to Shilov
Orest has informed me that a certain Shilov needs help. If I help, the trader will pay well. It might be worth seeing what this man wants.
Bad feeling: speak to Obscurant
Raven has informed me that Obscurant has arrived in the Cordon and that he’s at the vehicle station. Time to have a chat with him.
Tools: bring Van tools
Van has asked me to get two sets of tools: one for basic work and one for fine work. The technician will pay me for the tools and will be able to perform more advanced weapon and armor modifications.
Tools: bring Van tools

Van has asked me to get two sets of tools: one for basic work and one for calibration. The technician will pay me for the tools and will be able to perform more advanced weapon and armor modifications.
Tools: bring Van tools
Van has asked me to get a set of tools for basic work. The technician will pay me for the tools and will be able to perform more advanced weapon and armor modifications.
Tools: bring Van tools

Van has asked me to get two sets of tools: one for fine work and one for calibration. The technician will pay me for the tools and will be able to perform more advanced weapon and armor modifications.
Tools: bring Van tools
Van has asked me to get a set of tools for fine work. The technician will pay me for the tools and will be able to perform more advanced weapon and armor modifications.
Tools: bring Van tools
Van has asked me to get a set of tools for calibration. The technician will pay me for the tools and will be able to perform more advanced weapon and armor modifications.
Tools: bring Van tools

Van has asked me to get three sets of tools: one for basic work, one for fine work, and one for calibration. The technician will pay me for the tools and will be able to perform more advanced weapon and armor modifications.
Tools: bring Van tools
Van has asked me to get two sets of tools: one for fine work and one for basic work. The technician will pay me for the tools and will be able to perform more advanced weapon and armor modifications.
Tools: bring Van tools

Van has asked me to get two sets of tools: one for basic work and one for calibration. The technician will pay me for the tools and will be able to perform more advanced weapon and armor modifications.
Tools: bring Van tools
Van has asked me to get a set of tools for basic work. The technician will pay me for the tools and will be able to perform more advanced weapon and armor modifications.
Tools: bring Van tools

Van has asked me to get two sets of tools: one for fine work and one for calibration. The technician will pay me for the tools and will be able to perform more advanced weapon and armor modifications.
Tools: bring Van tools
Van has asked me to get a set of tools for basic work. The technician will pay me for the tools and will be able to perform more advanced weapon and armor modifications.
Tools: bring Van tools
Van has asked me to get a set of tools for calibration. The technician will pay me for the tools and will be able to perform more advanced weapon and armor modifications.
Tools: bring Van tools

Van has asked me to get three sets of tools: one for basic work, one for fine work, and one for calibration. The technician will pay me for the tools and will be able to perform more advanced weapon and armor modifications.
Bar #92: speak to Shaman
The trader has told me to speak to Shaman in the Bar and help him with some new problems.
Bar #92: wait for security in the Bar
Vulture has told me that getting security for the Bar will take some time.
Bar #92: retrieve payment from Shaman
Vulture has reported that the mercenaries have arrived. I should go see Shaman and take the money for their rent.
Bar #92: speak to Vulture
I need to talk to Vulture so that he can ask Jackal to spare a few men for us.
Special order: collect the goods
The goods have been delivered. Time to collect them from Douplet.
Special order: wait for delivery
The order has been made, so now I should wait for Douplet to get the goods.
